org.insa.java.controller

Class FileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.insa.java.controller.FileController

  • public class FileController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used for file transfer.
    Author:
    thomas thiebaud, unaï sanchez

    • Method Detail

      • sendFileTransfertDemand

        public void sendFileTransfertDemand(User user)
        Send a file transfer demand to an user.
        Parameters:
        user - Destination user.

      • sendFileTransfertConfirmation

        public void sendFileTransfertConfirmation(User user,
                                 boolean isAccepetd,
                                 int idDemand)
        Send a file transfer confirmation to an user. This message is send after receiving a file transfer demand.
        Parameters:
        user - Destination user.
        isAccepetd - File transfer accepted or not.
        idDemand - Id corresponding to the file transfer demand.

      • receivedMessage

        public void receivedMessage(User user,
                   Message msg)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Receive method concerning file messages.
        Parameters:
        user - User who sent the message.
        msg - Received message.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem when trying to write the file in the hard drive.

      • beginEmissionProtocol

        public void beginEmissionProtocol(User user,
                         java.io.File file)
        Begin protocol in order to send a file to a destination user.
        Parameters:
        user - Destination user.
        file - File to send.

      • beginReceptionProtocol

        public void beginReceptionProtocol(User user,
                          Message msg)
        Begin protocol in order to receive a file from a destination user.
        Parameters:
        user - Destination user.
        msg - File to receive.

      • emissionProtocol

        public void emissionProtocol(User user,
                    java.io.File file,
                    Message msg)
        Emission protocol. Contains state machine and all operations for sending a file to a destination user.
        Parameters:
        user - Destination user. Can be null when moving to Canceled state.
        file - File to send. Can be null when moving to Canceled state.
        msg - Generic message that can move the state machine to another state. Can be null when moving to Canceled state.

      • receptionProtocol

        public void receptionProtocol(User user,
                     FileTransfertDemand msg)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reception protocol. Contains state machine and all operations for receiving a file from a destination user.
        Parameters:
        user - Destination user. Can be null when moving to Canceled state.
        msg - Generic message that can move the state machine to another state. Can be null when moving to Canceled state.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - raised if there is a problem when saving file on hard drive.

      • moveReceptionStateTo

        public void moveReceptionStateTo(TransferState state,
                        User user)
        Update reception state machine to another state when receiving a message from a destination user
        Parameters:
        state - New state.
        user - Destination user.

      • moveReceptionStateTo

        public void moveReceptionStateTo(TransferState state)
        Update reception state machine to another state.
        Parameters:
        state - New state.

      • moveEmissionStateTo

        public void moveEmissionStateTo(TransferState state)
        Update emission state machine to another state.
        Parameters:
        state - New state.

      • getFilePartToSend

        public FilePart getFilePartToSend()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Get next part of the file to send.
        Returns:
        FilePart A FilePart message composed of a piece of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Raised if there is some problem to access to the file.
